context.name: Browning Maxus Sporting Black Carbon 28" Shotgun
context.excerpt: The Browning Maxus Sporting Black Carbon 28″ Shotgun has been specially designed for sports shooting. Its carbon finish gives a particularly unique style.
context.content:
The Browning Maxus Sporting Black Carbon 28" Shotgun has been specially designed for sports shooting. The ventilated rib, tapered from 6mm to 8mm, gives faster targeting. Its carbon finish gives a particularly unique style.

Featuring Browning's Power Drive gas system, the Maxus Sporting Carbon Fibre has been designed to perform under harsh hunting and shooting conditions with a wide array of loads. The Maxus is supremely reliable and mostly maintenance-free.
